revised_title: The Diffusion of Ions in Gases at Low Pressure: Experiments with Radium and Ultra-Violet Light
tldr: The author investigates the diffusion of ions in gases at low pressure using radium and ultra-violet light. The experiments reveal that the lateral diffusion of ions increases significantly as the pressure decreases and the electric force increases, suggesting an abnormal increase in the rate of diffusion and the mean kinetic energy of translation of the ions.
